subject: Re: [Samba] Re: Win32 services management?
body:
On Mon, Apr 16, 2007 at 05:50:35PM +0300, Danny Tylman wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> Attached is a bzr-diff containing the changes made in order to remotely
> create/delete service.

This looks really nice work - thanks ! I'll evaluate it and
if all looks ok it'll get in for 3.0.26.

Thanks,

	Jeremy.
